SEARCH
Module br.ufrn.imd.visao
Package br.ufrn.imd.modelo

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.modelo.Ship
All Implemented Interfaces:
IShip
Direct Known Subclasses:
Corvette, Destroyer, Frigate, Submarine
public abstract class Ship extends Object implements IShip
Abstract class representing a ship in the game. Implements basic ship functionalities and defines abstract methods to be implemented by specific ship types.

  • Field Summary

      Finds a specific cell of the ship on the game board.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate of the cell to find.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(List<CellButton> position) throws CelulaInvalidaException
      Sets the positions of the ship on the game board.
      Specified by:
      setPosition in interface IShip
      Parameters:
      position - The list of CellButton positions where the ship will be placed.
      Throws:
      CelulaInvalidaException - If the ship overlaps with another ship on any cell.

    • attack

      public abstract List<CellButton> attack(int row, int col)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses. Defines the behavior of the ship when it attacks.
      Specified by:
      attack in interface IShip
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate to attack.
      col - The column coordinate to attack.
      Returns:
      A list of CellButton objects representing the attacked cells.
